game_description: Want to make exercise fun? Punch, stretch, squat and step your way to fitness in this 360° game that will get you working up a sweat in no time. Designed with positive energy and mental wellbeing in mind, Hitstream takes you to stunning locations across the globe, bringing the outdoor world to you at a time when so much of it is off limits. Punch up, down, forward, to the side … catch the orbs, dodge the walls and, if you’re feeling really energetic, turn squats on. Just make sure you keep an eye out for where they’re coming from next! Every action is perfectly timed to the beat of the music, with soundtracks that have been specially selected to take you on a range of journeys, from uplifting adventures that work on agility to hard-hitting routines that build strength and stamina. Additional challenges await those who achieve a score of 90% or more -- can you make the grade? This demo features a selection of workouts to try out before deciding on the Full Version.
review_1: Absolutely love Hitstream. And I’m so impressed they actually upgraded the demo! The options are many, beautiful scenery, great music, punches are perfectly timed plus a great all around workout. I share the link often! Beach Vibes is my favorite. Just waiting for a sale to get the full version. But truly, the care and quality they put into the demo, and willingness to share that free, is worth the full price for full version. (Hitstream should be out of App-lab and in the store!)
review_3: Love love love this fitness app. Its fun...it switches things up alot so I don't feel bored...its 360 & FREE ....the demo is impressive, the music makes me want to do more, ...and sooo much fun that I'm purchasing the upgrade. And NO monthly subscription This one is a no-brainer to check out.
review_4: Not very fun compared to beat saber.
review_5: Hitting doesn't feel good. This game might've been ok 7 weeks ago but the competition is getting harder even on app lab.
